update TICKET_MAS set CALL_IN_COUNT = CALL_IN_COUNT + 1, MODIFYBY = #{userId}, MODIFYDATE = sysdate where TICKET_MAS_ID = #{ticketMasId}
update ticket_mas set ticket_type = #{type} , modifyby = #{userId}, modifydate = sysdate where ticket_mas_id = #{ticketMasId}
mapper.select: select t.statisticDate as statisticDate, count(tm.TICKET_TYPE) as totalCount, concat(ur.ROLE_DESC,concat('(',concat(tm.TICKET_TYPE,')'))) as statistics from TICKET_MAS tm inner join USER_ROLE ur on tm.OWNING_ROLE = ur.ROLE_ID right join (select to_char(SYSDATE - LEVEL + 1, 'yyyy-mm-dd') statisticDate from dual connect by level <= 90) t on to_char(tm.CREATEDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = t.statisticDate group by t.statisticDate, concat(ur.ROLE_DESC,concat('(',concat(tm.TICKET_TYPE,')'))) order by t.statisticDate

select t.statisticDate as statisticDate, count(tm.STATUS) as totalCount, concat(ur.ROLE_DESC,concat('(',concat(tm.STATUS,')'))) as statistics from TICKET_MAS tm inner join USER_ROLE ur on tm.OWNING_ROLE = ur.ROLE_ID right join (select to_char(SYSDATE - LEVEL + 1, 'yyyy-mm-dd') statisticDate from dual connect by level <= 90) t on to_char(tm.CREATEDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = t.statisticDate group by t.statisticDate,concat(ur.ROLE_DESC,concat('(',concat(tm.STATUS,')'))) order by t.statisticDate
